targets.expr: sum by(container_name, namespace_name) (increase(logging_googleapis_com:log_entry_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", cluster_name=~"$cluster", namespace_name=~"$namespace", severity=~"ERROR|CRITICAL", severity=~"ERROR|CRITICAL"}[$__interval]))
sum by (namespace, container, pod, image_spec) (kube_pod_container_info{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$service"})

panels.title: JVM Total Memory Max, Committed, Used

panels.description: This panel visualizes the total number of PostgreSQL database backends grouped by their operational state, specifically on the "overops" database. It helps monitor the distribution of database connections across various states.
panels.title: Connections by State

panels.description: Ratio of current memory usage over the memory quota to ensure efficient memory resource management.
panels.title: Memory Utilization

panels.description: This dashboard panel displays database latency measured in microseconds (us), providing insights into the response times of database queries and operations. It enables quick assessment of performance, with lower values indicating faster response times, while higher values may indicate delays in data retrieval or processing.
panels.title: Query latency

list.description: Used for linking to GCP when the project info is needed.
list.label: GCP Project
list.name: project

list.description: Database to match on in queries (hidden).
list.label: Database
list.name: database
